title: Stroke: A 5% Chance Of Survival
description: The day after losing his job, Ricky suffered a catastrophic haemorrhagic stroke aged just 38. The unconscious Ricky was wheeled into Brooklyn's Methodist Hospital with girlfriend Beth by his side and a 5% chance of survival. This is the story of his struggle to return to love, fatherhood and the home of his youth.
author: Ricky Monahan Brown
